intro: DecaDungeons™ is a first-person, turn-based dungeon crawler where fate is decided by a magical six-sided dice. Explore 10 deadly dungeons, battle fierce foes, hunt monsters, and survive!
description:
The Story:

Long ago, the kingdom thrived—ringed by vast forests, towering mountains, and tranquil seas. From its high walls, the great castle watched over a peaceful people… until the night Death rode through the gates on a black horse.

It passed silently through the streets, and ruin followed in its wake. Fire spread, plague consumed the weak, and despair swallowed the living. By dawn, the cries had faded, the streets were filled with the fallen, and a terrible curse had taken hold.

Since that day, the kingdom has lived under a broken pact. Every ten years, a chosen soul must descend into the darkness in the hope of ending the curse.

A secret council now prepares the ritual once more, forging a magical six-sided die—an artifact said to shape fate itself. The newly chosen knight rides toward the ten forbidden dungeons, where shadows cling to ancient stone… and deep within, the monsters wait.

The Game:

DecaDungeons™ is a first-person, turn-based dungeon crawler that blends classic DRPG mechanics with a minimalistic, atmospheric 3D pixel-art style.

Descend through ten deadly dungeons, battle powerful foes, and uncover the secrets needed to save the kingdom. Exploration is just as important as survival—hidden throughout the labyrinths are 50 Red Coins, waiting for those who search carefully.

Rare Monsters:

Some encounters carry a 1 in 100 chance to spawn a rare, rainbow-colored monster. These elusive foes grant massive rewards in EXP and gold. Few have seen them—will you be one of the lucky few?

Events:

While exploring, you’ll encounter special events—short scenarios that present three possible choices. Each decision carries risk or reward. Choose wisely… luck does not always favor the bold.

The Council Has Spoken:

The fate of the realm now rests in the hands of the dice-wielding knight.
Will you break the curse… or watch the kingdom fall into darkness?

Key Features:

10 unique, trap-filled dungeons

First-person, turn-based combat

50 hidden Red Coins to discover

Rare monsters with massive EXP and gold rewards

Random events with branching outcomes

Atmospheric 3D pixel-art environments
